content:
I think creating a private group would be the best option for #MakeADifferenceMV. I want to ensure that members feel comfortable sharing their thoughts and experiences, and a private group will provide a safe and respectful space for them to do so. I'll make sure to set up clear guidelines and rules for the group, and I'll work to maintain a positive and supportive environment.

Now that we've discussed the group's privacy settings, I'm ready to start creating the group! Do you have any tips on how to set up the group's profile, including the name, description, and profile picture?
